FD2A10C845583AC8766119BC9B171D51: Applies the specified value to the targeted control.
6448A09045C1CAE77FC87A827644B5A0: Change settings like knobs or toggles on another Patchwork device when triggered by a Fortnite Creative event.
BC795FA6430E5E00BE201CAF5DCE2889: Change settings like knobs or toggles on another Patchwork device when triggered by a Fortnite Creative event.
44EE048B49C6DA4B370EA89164D53824: Sets this value on the connected knob
AEBB6F474759D8C0C04A81ABB6AD6A4B: When this device sets a value, transmit a signal on the selected channel.

UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.SetValueOnRec: Applies the value to the targeted control when an event occurs.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.AllowPortSele: Determines if the Patchwork Tool can access any cable input or output ports on the device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.EnabledOnPhas: Determines the game phases during which the device will be enabled. Pre-game includes all phases prior to start of game (like the pre-game lobby or countdown to start of game.) This setting does not affect Edit Mode.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.TriggeredBySe: Determines whether to activate the trigger when it is touched by the Pulse Trigger, or by the pulse of an RNG Pulse device.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.TriggeredByPl: Determines whether to trigger this device based on player proximity.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.TriggeredByDa: Determines whether to trigger this device when it receives damage.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.Disable.Descr: Disables the device when an event occurs.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.Enable.Descri: Enables the device when an event occurs.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.LegalInfo.Des: Please note: Use of a Patchwork audio device is limited to the creation of new and original musical works.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.Blend.Descrip: Sets a time in beats to blend from the targeted control's current value to the new value. This blend begins after any Delay time.
Sets the destination for this device's Modulator Out cable.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.BlendIn.Descr: Sets the inputs for this device's Blend knob.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.DelayIn.Descr: Sets the inputs for this device's Delay carousel.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.ValueIn.Descr: Sets the inputs for this device's Value knob.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.Delay.Descrip: Sets the musical interval to wait before applying the value to the targeted control.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.Value.Descrip: Sets the value that will be applied to the targeted control.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.OnDisabled.De: Triggers an event when the device is disabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.OnEnabled.Des: Triggers an event when the device is enabled.
UserOptionDefinition.Device_FabricValueSetter_C.OnValueSet.De: Triggers an event whenever this device applies its value to the targeted control.
